/* Structure for courses */
class Course {
  constructor(code, name, desc, prer, crer, preq, creq, excl, term, cred) {
    Object.assign(this, {code, name, desc, prer, crer,
        preq, creq, excl, term, cred});
    this.preqs = [];
    this.creqs = [];
    this.excls = [];
    this.dreqs = [];
    this.ddict = {};
  }
}
